name: Transmat
overview: A game by Toby Hughes (written when he was 13) and with music by Andrew Colin, published in Commodore Computing International v02-12 (May 1984). It is an adventure game which involves the Transmat - a machine similar to the one used by Captain Kirk and his crew to beam up and down, photon lasers, explosives, a long scarf and a sonic screwdriver because why not?
